intro: Cliffortia exilifolia, commonly known as the slender leaf daisies, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is a member of the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils, often found in coastal or mountainous regions. Its small, daisy-like flowers are usually white or pale yellow, and it produces small, oval-shaped seeds. Cliffortia exilifolia is well adapted to arid conditions, making it a resilient species in its native habitat.
